channel.title: Winner Bakes All on
channel.description: Recent content in Winner Bakes All on

item.title: Rosaline Palmer Takes the Cake
item.description: I laughed. I cried. I have a therapist now. How many books can do that, AND homage the hell out of the Great British Bake Off? Rosaline Palmer does take the cake.

item.title: Paris Daillencourt is About to Crumble
item.description: Once again Alexis Hall takes away the book I thought I wanted and replaces it with the book I actually need. Reading this at the same time as [[books/the body keeps the score|The Body Keeps the Score]], though, just means Iâ€™m peeking between the lines of all the parental neglect and trauma and thinking, dearest Paris, get thee to some somatic therapy, medication is just a start.
